data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Agusan del Sur, Philippines to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Agusan del Sur, Philippines
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Agusan del Sur, Philippines to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 319,480 believers in Agusan del Sur against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Agusan del Sur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Manobo, Umayamnon people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Agusan del Sur, Philippines will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, move the 319,480 believers in the state of Agusan del Sur to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Agusan del Sur. Through your servants plant 458 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
